subject: CLAS
title: Elementary Latin I
description: Introduction to the structure of Latin with emphasis on reading Latin and on the role of Latin to the development of English. (Available for General Education Comparative Cultural Studies.)

subject: CLAS
title: Greek and Roman Mythology
description: Prerequisite: Completion of the Lower Division writing requirement. Study of the myths of Greeks and Romans and of their impact on the literature of the Western world. Conducted in English. (Available for General Education Arts and Humanities.)

subject: CLAS
title: Elementary Latin II
description: Continuation of CLAS 101. (Available for General Education Comparative Cultural Studies.)
